title: bicoeff
description: The `bicoeff` object is a graphical user interface (GUI) that generates coefficients for vanilla Pure Data's `biquad~` filter. Users can interactively click and drag on the GUI to set filter frequency, bandwidth, and gain for various filter types like lowpass, highpass, bandpass, and shelving filters. It outputs a list of 5 coefficients suitable for the `biquad~` object.
